localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Did you ever wonder how much you would have earned if you'd invested $1,000 in today’s public companies IPOs?
blogPost.body: Did you ever wonder how much you would have earned if you'd invested $1,000 in today’s public companies IPOs?
blogPost.title: One thousand in - How much would you have if you invested $1000 in an IPO?
blogPost.author: Miguel Nunes Correia

localize.description: 你有没有想过，如果你投资1000元在今天的上市公司IPO，你会赚多少钱？
localize.tagline: 如果你在IPO上投资1000元，你会有多少钱？

localize.description: 你有沒有想過，如果你投資1000元在今天的上市公司IPO，你會賺多少錢？
localize.tagline: 如果你在IPO上投資1000元，你會有多少錢？

previous.title:
It's been one hell of a year. Our team went remote this day last March, but we didn’t slow down! 

400% growth in active users and 1000%+ growth for our Daily Rip newsletter (1.1M subs)! 👀

A huge thank you to our ever-growing & ever-supportive community. Big things on the way👊

localize.full_text:
这是一个地狱的一年。去年3月的这一天，我们的团队实现了远程办公，但我们并没有放慢脚步! 

活跃用户增长了400%，我们的Daily Rip通讯增长了1000%以上（110万订阅者）。👀

衷心感谢我们不断成长的&amp；不断支持我们的社区。伟大的事情在路上👊。

這是一個地獄的一年。去年3月的這一天，我們的團隊實現了遠程辦公，但我們並沒有放慢腳步! 

活躍用戶增長了400%，我們的Daily Rip通訊增長了1000%以上（110萬訂閱者）。👀

衷心感謝我們不斷成長的&amp；不斷支持我們的社區。偉大的事情在路上👊。

next.excerpt: Vtiger Cloud CRM now has a Forever Free edition for all those who sign up in 2021. Pilot Edition is a part of the Vtiger Re: boot program, and this is built to help companies to accelerate their growth and recovery coming out of the pandemic.
next.title: Vtiger Pilot - Free CRM software built for companies getting started

localize.description: Vtiger云CRM现在有一个永远免费版，凡是在2021年注册的用户都可以使用。试用版是Vtiger Re。引导计划，这是建立在帮助企业加快发展和恢复走出大流行。
localize.tagline: 免费的CRM软件，为企业的起步打造

localize.description: Vtiger雲CRM現在有一個永遠免費版，凡是在2021年註冊的用戶都可以使用。試用版是Vtiger Re。引導計劃，這是建立在幫助企業加快發展和恢復走出大流行。
localize.tagline: 免費的CRM軟件，爲企業的起步打造
